meaningMnemonic: If there is a <kanji>cave in</kanji> because it was <kanji>lack</kanji>ing something that means there was a <vocabulary>defect</vocabulary> or a <vocabulary>fault</vocabulary> in there somewhere.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
